platforms.name: Pornhub
platforms.instructions: Use the Content Removal form. Select 'Non-consensual' as the reason. Photo ID may be required.

platforms.name: XVideos
platforms.instructions: Use the contact form selecting 'Report Abuse'. Include all URLs and proof of identity.

platforms.name: XNXX
platforms.instructions: Same owner as XVideos. Use contact form with 'Abuse Report' subject.

platforms.name: OnlyFans
platforms.instructions: Submit DMCA form. Requires government ID verification for NCII claims.

platforms.name: Twitter/X
platforms.instructions: Use 'Private Information' reporting form. Select 'intimate media' category.

platforms.name: Reddit
platforms.instructions: Report > 'Non-consensual intimate media'. Reddit has strict NCII policies.

platforms.name: Instagram
platforms.instructions: Use 'Report Something' > 'Nudity or Sexual Activity' > 'Sharing private images'.

platforms.name: Facebook
platforms.instructions: Use the dedicated intimate image removal form. Consider StopNCII.org hash program.

platforms.name: TikTok
platforms.instructions: Privacy report form > 'Image of me shared without consent'.

platforms.name: YouTube
platforms.instructions: Privacy complaint process. Select 'Privacy' > 'I appear in content I did not consent to'.

platforms.name: Other Platform
platforms.instructions: Search for the platform's 'Report Abuse', 'DMCA', or 'Trust & Safety' contact page. Most platforms are required to respond to valid DMCA notices within 24-72 hours.

resources.name: StopNCII.org
resources.description: Create a hash of your images without uploading them. Partners include Meta, TikTok, Reddit, and others.

resources.name: Cyber Civil Rights Initiative
resources.description: Free support, resources, and referrals for NCII victims.

resources.name: NCMEC Take It Down
resources.description: For victims under 18. Free service to remove explicit content.
